WorldWindowGLCanvas WorldWindowGLCanvas is a heavyweight AWT component for displaying World Wind Models (globe and layers).
WorldWindowGLJPanel WorldWindowGLCanvas is a lightweight Swing component for displaying World Wind Models (globe and layers).
